"Among the chief rulers also many believed on Him," we read; "but because of the Pharisees they did not confess 
                                                                           106
Him, lest they should be put out of the synagogue." John 12:42. They were convinced; they believed Jesus to be the Son of God; but it was not in harmony with their ambitious desires to confess Him. They had not the faith that would have secured for them the heavenly treasure. They were seeking worldly treasure.
